value:
I was...alone. There was nothing...
Not one solitary thing...but me.

I heard His Majesty Zephiel so
clearly. The world was overrun
with vermin. I was to cleanse it.

Humans are never still... They hurry
back and forth, back and forth...To
what purpose, I never understand.

Your hand... It's so warm. Can
we stay like this a little longer?

I slept so long...so very long. And as
I dreamed in that limitless darkness...
I saw boundless, bare white.

I am Idunn... I have become...
I don't know what the word is...
with $Nf.

I am the Demon Dragon,
destroyer of humans... As
His Majesty desires.
The world will be freed...

Perhaps I slept too long...
I stumbled.

What is this? What does it
mean? Are you asking
something of me?

I am Idunn... His Majesty has
tasked me with bringing freedom
to the world. That is my mission.

His Majesty told me that humans
were a stain on the world that had
to be scrubbed out...$k$pYou believe the precise opposite.
Your goal is to protect the world
and those in it.$k$pI find this very confusing. What
will humans do with the world?
And what should I do?$k$pWas it to help fulfill your purpose
that I was pulled to this place
beyond time?$k$pCan I believe the things you tell me?$k$pFor now...I will follow where you
lead and seek those answers.
はっ
必ず
きゃああっ！
だめです…
I will lead.
You are in my way.
By my will.
Why resist?
So lonely...
...ehe
You called me here... Why?
...What exactly is your goal?
For age after age...I lie sleeping.
I woke up. Because it is what His Majesty desired...
I...have been ordered to lead this world.
No matter how many thousand suns pass, no matter how many thousand moons…I must.
I feel that long, long ago...I met a person much like you. Someone...warm...
Yes.
The wind...
This world...
